Articles.Content:
Yo, Zade here. Been having a blast.. quite literally with KSP. No questions or anything, just giving a shout out.

So far I have 3 satellites, 2 of which stopped working because I didn't know about batteries. I have debris all over the place from my "Master Exploder" space initiative. and have finally crash landed 2 Kerbals on the Mun.. no, they didn't survive. I feel my "Wat Me Worry?" program is doing better with only one Kerbal stranded in the Mun's orbit.. I am working on sending me "Kill Bill" team to someday fetch him. I've posted pics on my facebook page, so search for "Sheherezade Blanc" from Ausrtin, TX or whatever

Welcome to the forums!

If you get stuck figuring out how to complete your rescue mission successfully, feel free to ask in the How To section of the forums. I'd also highly recommend checking out some of the resources listed in the Drawing Board (link in my sig) for some general tips as well.

Happy landings!
Welcome! only two defunct satellites. So far a successful program!

Welcome to KSP, you fabulous Austrian mother f****r! I have to say, you've given me a better impression just with a couple sentences and by checking out your Facebook page than most people do when I actually meet them in person.
I tip my hat to thee then, good sir. I prefer a healthy dose of respect to people until they earn a good thrashing
